hero.title: About SustainSage

brand.title: SustainSage in brief
brand.lead: SustainSage Group Ltd. is a UK-based coaching practice helping mid-career professionals, returners, and newcomers take steady, experiment-led steps.
paragraphs: We partner with people who are navigating UK workplaces while holding multilingual or multicultural identities. Sessions can flow in English, Mandarin, or a mixâ€”whichever helps you think clearly.
Our work is grounded in the International Coaching Federation (ICF) code of ethics, and we keep agreements and data handling transparent so you can focus on your decisions.
highlights: ICF-aligned coaching rooted in calm, client-led partnership.
Bilingual English and Mandarin support with cultural context across the UK and Greater China.
Focus on mid-career shifts, return-to-work journeys, and newcomers rebuilding confidence.

practice.title: How we hold the coaching space
practice.lead: Every engagement is designed to stay practical, ethical, and responsive to your evolving goals.

pillars.title: Clear agreements and ethics
pillars.description: We open with scope-setting, informed consent, and confidentiality boundaries that align with ICF guidance and UK privacy law.

pillars.title: Reflective experiments
pillars.description: You bring the situations that matter. Together we surface insights and design small experiments that you can test safely in real life.

pillars.title: Consistent review
pillars.description: We pause frequently to review usefulness, adjust pacing, or signpost other services if therapy, legal, or clinical support would serve you better.

coach.title: Meet the coach
coach.lead: H.T. Tsai (she/her) is the founder of SustainSage and a bilingual career and leadership coach based in London.
paragraphs: HT trained with an ICF-accredited programme and continues to work with qualified supervision to keep the practice ethical and reflective.
Before coaching full-time, she led cross-functional teams in technology and social impact organisations across Taiwan and the UK, specialising in inclusive product delivery and change enablement.
highlights: Partnership with mid-career professionals, returners, and global talent exploring the UK market.
Experience supporting East Asian diaspora professionals to translate strengths across cultures and communicate with senior stakeholders.
Research-led, experiment-focused approach that blends reflective questioning with practical templates you can adapt.
